mapper.insert:
select ordernum_seq.nextval from dual
insert into ordered(orderednum,ordered_from_tel,ordered_from_post,ordered_no,ordered_to_name,ordered_to_tel, ordered_to_email,ordered_to_adr,ordered_to_post,ordered_payhow,ordered_paystate,ordered_orderprice,ordered_date,idx_fk,pnum_fk) values(#{orderedNum},#{ordered_from_tel},#{ordered_from_post}, #{ordered_no},#{ordered_to_name},#{ordered_to_tel}, #{ordered_to_email},#{ordered_to_adr},#{ordered_to_post},#{ordered_payhow},#{ordered_paystate},#{ordered_orderprice},#{ordered_date},#{idx_fk},#{pnum_fk})
